notes: USA-based supplier of squalane derived from sustainable sugar cane (vegan-friendly, synthetic, high purity) for high-purity cosmetics and vegan skincare. Applications: Lighter than olive-derived squalane, non-greasy skin feel. Synthetic from sustainable sugar cane with high purity. Mid-range pricing ($50-75/kg) with cosmetic-grade quantities. Samples available for formulators. Cosmetic grade and high purity certified. USA-based distribution with international shipping. Technical specifications and formulation support provided. Ideal for brands seeking lighter, sugar-based squalane alternatives.
